snippet: At least 10 people were injured, three of them critically, in an explosion on Thursday at a steel castings plant in southwestern Illinois, officials said.
abstract: At least 10 people are injured, three of them critically, in explosion at American Steel Foundries plant in Granite City, Ill.
lead_paragraph: At least 10 people were injured, three of them critically, in an explosion on Thursday at a steel castings plant in southwestern Illinois, officials said.

headline.main: Illinois: Explosion at Steel Plant Injures 10
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Explosion at Steel Plant Injures 10
